quotes.quote: Our choices determine our destiny.
It is your thoughts and your thoughts alone that determine what's possible for you now.
Your friends will determine the quality and direction of your life.
Goals determine what you're going to be.
The things you think about determine the quality of your mind. Your soul takes on the color of your thoughts.
Choosing to be positive and having a grateful attitude is going to determine how you're going to live your life.
What you fear most will determine whether you merely save for the future or give for the future.
Your present circumstances don't determine where you can go; they merely determine where you start.
Meanings are not determined by situations, but we determine ourselves by the meanings we give to situations.
To mobilize yourself, decide what you want, determine what will get you what you want, then act - do what will get you what you want most to achieve.
Determine where you are going and how you will get there will become obvious.

We are not determined by our experiences, but are self-determined by the meaning we give to them; and when we take particular experiences as the basis for our future life, we are almost certain to be misguided to some degree. Meanings are not determined by situations. We determine ourselves by the meanings we ascribe to situations.
Its very difficult to determine whether this is the fault of the world that has abandoned the Church, or the Church that does not know how to relate to the world.
The kinds of nets we know how to weave determine the kinds of nets we cast. These nets, in turn, determine the kinds of fish we catch.
Other people's opinions do not determine your potential.
Our response to an offense determines our future.
What we value determines what we do.
What you do daily determines what you become permanently.
It's hard to determine where lies culpability.
Your initial approach to a person can determine your feelings toward them.
What you choose today will determine who you are tomorrow.
Determine a single measure that you can use to grade your progress and success in each area of your life. Refer to it daily.
Determine to live life with flair and laughter.
Age is how we determine how valuable you are.
Determine that the thing can and shall be done and then... find the way.
Only you can determine your choice of attitude. Choose wisely, choose carefully, choose confidently!
Elections determine who is in power, but they do not determine how power is used.
Our integrity determines what we really are.
The past doesn't determine your future unless you carry it with you into the present. Forgiving yourself and others, you free the universe to begin again at any moment.
Your habits will determine your quality of life.
The leader's attitude helps determine the attitudes of the followers.
Your attitude determines your actions, and your actions determine your accomplishment.
Our deeds determine us, as much as we determine our deeds.
Actions determine what kind of characteristics are developed.
Trying to determine what is going on in the world by reading newspapers is like trying to tell the time by watching the second hand of a clock.
Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude.
What you think determines your outlook on life. What you do determines your destiny.
Your thoughts determine your frequency, and your feelings tell you immediately what frequency you are on.

If you determine your course With force or speed, You miss the way of the dharma. Quietly consider What is right and what is wrong. Receiving all opinions equally, Without haste, wisely, Observe the dharma.
Determine to do some thinking for yourself. Don't live entirely upon the thoughts of others. Don't be an automaton.
Leadership ability determines a person's level of effectiveness.
Your attitude is everything, and it determines how you experience every aspect of your life.
Money will determine whether the accused goes to prison or walks out of the courtroom a free man.
Personnel determines the potential of the team. Vision determines the direction of the team. Work ethic determines the preparation of the team. Leadership determines the success of the team.
You too can determine what you want. You can decide on your major objectives, targets, aim and destination.
Stay focused. Your start does not determine how you're going to finish.
Your optimism today will determine your level of success tomorrow.
The way you treat others determines the way others treat you; the way others treat you determines the way you see yourself; the way you see yourself determines who you are.
Either you will determine truth by your feelings or truth will determine your feelings. Be careful following feelings alone.
